About.Hours & facilities: Local History Officers are contactable during business hours. The Archives is open to the public by appointment only, reference collections and microfiche are available at local libraries.

About.Access: A research service is available, for details contact the Local History Officer in writing or by telephone.

About.Acquisition focus: Archival material and memorabilia from the Community and Council, of the area now known as the City of Stonnington, from settlement pre 1840's to the present.

About.Major holdings: Photographs, documents, building plans, land subdivision plans, records, civic and ceremonial memorabilia, research notes, oral recollections, newspapers, real estate files, annual reports

About.References: A list of historical publications, which are available for sale or for loan from local libraries, is available from the web site

Contact.Enquiries to: Local History Officers, or via online feeback form at http://www.stonnington.vic.gov.au/history/feedback

Contact.Note: The collection includes the former Malvern Archive and Malvern Historical Society, and Prahran Archive and Prahran Historical and Arts Society Collections
